Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1968...
Had first career hit on 7/16/1972, off Dwight Siebler (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/1972, off Charlie Hough (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 4/8/1981...
Injured on 6/16/1982 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (N) on 8/22/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/1/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $680,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/6/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
